state_analysis: The command to list all Docker containers has timed out again, indicating that the Docker service is still unresponsive. This ongoing issue suggests a critical failure either within the Docker installation or the host system itself, preventing any command execution.
explanation: Since all previous attempts to troubleshoot the Docker environment have failed to yield any results, I will now consider the option of completely uninstalling and then reinstalling Docker. This step will help ensure that any corrupted files or configurations are cleared. After the reinstallation, I will check if the Docker service starts correctly and if commands can be executed successfully.

commands.keystrokes: sudo apt-get purge docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io
sudo apt-get install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io
